channel.title: 508 help
channel.description: Hi, I am just wondering how you would run like two servers at once? I have my 317 going on port 43594, and I cant find out how to get my 508 to change ports. So that I can have them both on at the same time. Help me please?

item.title: 508 help
item.dc:creator: @teh0wn_ltd teh0wn ltd
item.description:
@teh0wn_ltd wrote:

change your 317’s port to 5555
and leave you 508’s port to 43594 thats what i did till i got vps

Read full topic
